title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 119.5 - Presentation of the case of the bureau of unclaimed funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 119.5 - Presentation of the case of the bureau of unclaimed funds

State Regulations

Upon completion of the claimant's case, the Bureau of

Unclaimed Funds shall have the opportunity to offer proofs in opposition to the
claimant's case and call and examine any and all witnesses on its
behalf. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
119.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
